reviews.review: An incredibly ambitious film with so much star power. However, the two and a half hour film goes by quickly and the large cast feels manageable. It truly is a tribute to the infinite number of MCU movies before it.

If Quicksilver survived in Age of Ultron, he would've had a much bigger role than he had beyond the 2 MCU films he appeared in. 
Infinity War: He would become more accepting of Vision and Wandaâ(TM)s love for each other, even giving them his blessing and react how Rocket Raccoon can speak. And the latter would say âI couldnâ(TM)t even run that fast like that guy.â? He would help his sister, Vision, Black Widow and Cap fight Corvus Glaive and Proxima Midnight by dodging Proxmia's attacks and attempting to destabilize Glaive, only to be hit by his glaive right before being impaled in the back by Black Widow. By this time, he would be capable of reaching supersonic speeds between Mach 4 and Mach 5. He would also outrun everyone else again, passing like a blur and create 3 duplicates of himself to help kill some of the Outriders during the Battle of Wakanda, surprised how big Wakanda is, even calling it similar to Narnia. Later, he would help Cap escort Wanda and Vision to a safe place, admitting even with his speed becoming more powerful as he becomes older, "The big purple alien" would not stay down and try to attack Thanos, but he would freeze the speedster and beat him down, being surprised how fast a human can be and senses he has the potential for limitless speed.  Not to mention, like Wanda, he would also lose his accent and be erased during the snap alongside his sister, his last words being âWell, I never saw that coming.â? I created a petition to bring him back to the land of the living. Please sign up and spread the word!!

one of the best movies ever made
Despite the immense pressure to live up to something 10 years in the making, Avengers Infinity War goes above and beyond expectations and delivers on every aspect.
Really enjoyed it, especially with the unusual ending, though there were a few things continuity wise that were a bit confusing. Looking forward to the next one.

Easily the best entry in the MCU
It's rare when the actual audience can agree with the over paid and under worked movie critics.
Loved everything- except that Hulk was smashed...
